title: Perm banned for this?
body:
https://gyazo.com/4469fa5ac2b820dd11e771ae840040d1

pardon me Riot support, but do you check your chat logs when you ban your players?
Yeah I was toxic, but a permanent ban for ONE game after several where I've been pleasant etc?
Little bit unfair don't you think?

Talk to me about this, community be damned, I'd like to hear from a Riot employee.

replies.body: That permaban for your other account wasn't done after just one instance of in-game toxicity. After looking at the account, it was given the standard process of chat restriction warnings, to longer restrictions, up through a 2-week then perma. If you need the full context of what happened, you're always welcome to reach out to the player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
